alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 08 at 2:07PM MDT until April 09 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts to around 60 mph expected. * WHERE...The Rocky Mountain Front, including all of Glacier County. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to Noon MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel may be difficult for high profile vehicles and towing units. Blowing dust could reduce visibility at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A period of strong winds is expected to develop this evening following the passage of a cold front and continuing through early Saturday morning.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
